name: shortest-path
description: Calculates the cheapest path between locations

scripts.migrate_up: knex migrate:rollback --knexfile=src/config/knexfile.js --env=dev && knex migrate:latest --knexfile=src/config/knexfile.js --env=dev && knex seed:run --knexfile=src/config/knexfile.js --env=dev

author: Andre Ravazzi
